description: The Classic Pile Jacket offers excellent warmth and is designed for everyday use. It’s made in a high loft, recycled polyester perfect for any kind of outdoor expedition, and has a super soft feel. It is piped around all hems for a clean look and finish, and has comfy elastic piping around the cuffs. The outside of the collar and the external pocket has a woven, recycled face for extra wind resistance and soft, fleece lining on the inside. Other practical features include thumbholes and zippered hand warming pockets.
name: Norrona Norrona Warm3 Jacket - Mens
